# [Interview #1094: Salt Lake City Comic-Con 2014, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1094#22)

#### Question

Do you have other minor Shardworlds?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yeah I have a bunch of them, and which ones are worth telling a story in will depend on when I get around to it whether theyâ€™re worth it.
